name: Saltmarsh Delta
role_in_state: primary salt supplier and tidal transshipment hub
economy_niches: transshipment point for inland goods via estuary skiffs
culture_adjustments: stronger tide-rituals and local augury variants
seasonal working rhythms tied to spring-neap tides
practical salvage culture; looting normalized in storms
oral tide-proverbs supplement standard Coastal Tongues lexicon
constraints: limited arable land and poor soils
heavy ritual reagents require imported transport
notes: vital to state's salt and ritual-component supply chains
seasonal access windows govern trade and festivals
